item.description:
6 Photographers in a studio with models and hair and make up artist- working out a Film Noir Style photo session...

What is film noir? It is a gritty, contrasty, black and white, style of images. If you Google Film Noir you'll see a ton of movies that were filmed in this style - we want to spend the day creating images that reflect this style.

Anyone interested?

We'll be meeting at the studio at 9:30 to discuss ideas and how to make the images. We'll need a few models, and we are looking for props like old dresses, hats, over coats, cigaret holders, anything that that would look good in the photos.

We may need to chip in to pay a makeup artist/ hairstylist, but with models this is strictly a TFCD. If there is a MUA that wants to do TFCD- then sign them up!!

Questions should be directed to John B: jbie@charter.net

Cheers,
Donna

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Film Noir Style Photo Shoot
